title: About Senna secret passive..
body: Guys i played an aram against senna and i had Thresh... When i killed her i got plus 40 ad plus 50 range and plus 30% crit chance.... Does anyone know wtf is this?

replies.body:
Isnt it like... fkin overpowred? 
So much permanent stats technically for free? 
Or I don't understand something?
arguably, but it's not the only instance, look into the 'Hunt' event between rengar and kha'zix and suddenly those stats don't seem as bad
a 4th evolution point and bonus damage? Yea pfft who needs that garbo. The liss, sej, ashe one gives you a floating crown over your champ...
It is a quest, which you won. If she wins then she takes all your souls and gets like 40 stacks of mist or something. There are others in the game like Rengar vs Kha'Zix too.

> [{quoted}](name=nm1010,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-12T15:39:10.465+0000)
>
> It is a quest, which you won. If she wins then she takes all your souls and gets like 40 stacks of mist or something. There are others in the game like Rengar vs Kha'Zix too.

She doesnt take souls (thresh doesnt lose any). She gets 30armor and 30ap.
That's way too much power for one of the Quest bonuses. That's absolutely insane.

To be fair, I think that quest happens at a point in the game where those bonuses don’t matter all that much. 
During the late game, if Senna completes the quest she is most likely already fed and her team is in their final push to end the game. And the opposite is same for Thresh, when he finishes the quest his team is most likely snowballing hard and there isn’t much that Senna and her team can do to stop it

If that quest was available at the beginning of the game (like during lane phase) then I agree that is overpowered as fuck and needs to be taken out. But if it is just a late game quest then I don’t think it is that big/game breaking.
Correct, its level 16 or 18 when it happens. I think 16, but dont quote me on it. Its practically available when the game should be already over in one teamfight.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=000c00000001,timestamp=2019-11-12T20:15:12.833+0000)
>
> Correct, its level 16 or 18 when it happens. I think 16, but dont quote me on it. Its practically available when the game should be already over in one teamfight.

Activates when senna gets 100mists and every player is alive.
Ah. Well if it becomes too problematic you could technically add another 20 to the requirement.
Also it probably never affects ranked. Just normals fun.
Yeah it would be stupid for a quest like that to be used in ranked lol

> [{quoted}](name=Doge2020,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=000c000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-12T19:54:37.355+0000)
>
> Yeah it would be stupid for a quest like that to be used in ranked lol

Its in ranked too. Same goes for khazix vs rengar.
It's less power than what the {{champion:107}} vs {{champion:121}} quest gives.

> [{quoted}](name=Bouncemaster Zac,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2019-11-12T18:22:35.802+0000)
>
> That's way too much power for one of the Quest bonuses. That's absolutely insane.

dude kha and rengar is getting way more out of the quest senna has like no ap scaling and crit and ad on thresh is also not best

Somehow, while this quest sounds cool in theory, it seems lopsided. Thresh is much closer to a true support, which means, while he has some potential for damage in his kit, he doesn't really build damage or aim to kill opponents as much as provide picks, peel, utility, etc. Therefore, senna is far more likely to kill thresh than thresh is likely to kill senna. Unlike kha and rengar, thresh and senna aren't even remotely similar and the matchup is nowhere near even.

> [{quoted}](name=ImTheJuggernauty,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-11-12T16:40:42.970+0000)
>
> Somehow, while this quest sounds cool in theory, it seems lopsided. Thresh is much closer to a true support, which means, while he has some potential for damage in his kit, he doesn't really build damage or aim to kill opponents as much as provide picks, peel, utility, etc. Therefore, senna is far more likely to kill thresh than thresh is likely to kill senna. Unlike kha and rengar, thresh and senna aren't even remotely similar and the matchup is nowhere near even.

For a 1v1 sense, yes.

If Thresh lands a hook on Senna in lane or in a teamfight it´s a jokers coin toss if she dies instantly, near instantly, barely or not at all though.

Quest is finished on assists as well if i recall.

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2019-11-12T16:47:51.748+0000)
>

> 
> If Thresh lands a hook on Senna in lane or in a teamfight it´s a jokers coin toss if she dies instantly, near instantly, barely or not at all though.
> 
> Quest is finished on assists as well if i recall.

Oh well, if assists count, then I rescind everything I said lol
There should be another secret interaction between Senna and Thresh that if they play in same team, Senna would refuse to touch the lantern.

> [{quoted}](name=Delifox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-11-12T17:55:45.765+0000)
>
> There should be another secret interaction between Senna and Thresh that if they play in same team, Senna would refuse to touch the lantern.

I think Thresh gets that passive for every adc player not just Senna.
The opposite is also true.  If Senna kills Thresh, she gains 30 armor and AP.
Lucian is also involved If I am not mistaken. Probably the same benefit as Senna.
more interactions between champs that should be removed because their only purpose is to upset balance...yay
a classic balance vs fun approach that riot has to walk the line on

Wait...

Holy crap, that explains where i got all those souls from

Yeah, it's just the Quest lines like 
Kha vsv Regar
Ashe vs Sejuani vs Lissandra

Just those rare little extras certain champions have when interacting with each other
Catlyn and Vi gets +1 gold for killing Jinx, and Thresh gets basically a whole ítem for killing Senna... why doesn't this look balanced to me...
Because you're leaving out a lot in your comparison, maybe?
It’s like rengar vs kha.
That's stupid. Thresh can barely use that 30% crit chance, whereas if Senna steals all of his souls, that's huge for her.

> Thresh can barely use that 30% crit chance

Clearly you haven't played against AD Thresh

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfeur,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=00140000,timestamp=2019-11-13T11:16:44.595+0000)
>
> Clearly you haven't played against AD Thresh

I'm not talking about troll builds

> troll builds

**Clearly **you haven't played against AD Thresh

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfeur,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=0014000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-13T13:45:47.108+0000)
>
> **Clearly **you haven't played against AD Thresh

It **is** a troll build. Sure, you deal damage. With the first auto. And then you're useless. You have abysmal range and tiny dps because of the attack wind-up. If you use your abilities, your dps drops even lower, because they have such long cast times.
Sure, it's fun to play, but it is a troll build nonetheless. If you want a support, you can't afford AD items. And even if you could, you would probably be less useful than with a traditional support build anyway. If you want adc, you pick someone with higher range and bigger dps.
Unless I'm wrong and you saw AD Thresh played in high elo ranked games.

The crit is useless, but 50 range and 40 AD is a fuckton of damage. His E has a 200% AD ratio, so his AA will do 300% of his AD. 40 AD is 120 damage. She also doesn't get his souls. She just gets the AP and Armor. 30 AP. 30 Armor. 2 cloth armors and an amp tome, essentially. Thresh gets 50 range, which is huge, and a BF sword worth of AD.

Whenever Thresh is opposing Senna in a match and both parties reach a certain level (i think 16) a quest will trigger. 

If Senna kills Thresh, she steals a large portion of his souls, and gains the benefit that he would normally get from them (I think each soul grants .75 armor and ability power?). If Thresh kills her, than he collects some of the mists that she has collected, and gets the benefit that SHE would normally have. 

Whats broken is that it actually steals that buffs from the losing player. If Senna is wrecking the enemy, and then kills Thresh for the quest (which is likely) then she gets armor and ap, THEN Thresh loses that armor and ap. 

It's stupid

> [{quoted}](name=Hay5eed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2019-11-12T20:17:59.567+0000)

> Whenever Thresh is opposing Senna in a match and both parties reach a certain level (i think 16) a quest will trigger. 
> 
> If Senna kills Thresh, she steals a large portion of his souls, and gains the benefit that he would normally get from them (I think each soul grants .75 armor and ability power?). If Thresh kills her, than he collects some of the mists that she has collected, and gets the benefit that SHE would normally have. 
> 
> Whats broken is that it actually steals that buffs from the losing player. If Senna is wrecking the enemy, and then kills Thresh for the quest (which is likely) then she gets armor and ap, THEN Thresh loses that armor and ap. 
> 
> It's stupid

1: it activates when every player is alice at the same time and senna has 100mists.
2: You dont lose souls/mists if u lose. The tooltip is wrong if it states so.

oh thank god! I think i just misinterpreted a clip I saw on youtube. 

He was playing Senna and won the quest, and the quest says something like "senna has won and has stoled # of souls from thresh" and I was like "WTF?"
thresh also gets some great bonus stats if he kills senna its a quest like khaz and rengars
Quests only happen in nonranked games BTW. Just so everyone knows.

> [{quoted}](name=LightswornLance,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEVaxFMl,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2019-11-12T20:28:53.611+0000)
>
> Quests only happen in nonranked games BTW. Just so everyone knows.

I can confirm that this is false. Just got the event in ranked flex.
Maybe its a bug with senna because none of the other quests happen in ranked.

>

Rengar vs Kha quest happens in ranked.

I once lost a game cuz Rengar inted after hunt started, giving Kha next evolution and they had the advantages they needed on us.
Senna also gains this if she kills Thresh IIRC
More like get senna out of the game.
it's their quest yes
When cait/vi cop chases her or Lucian they run faster
